statements: SELECT * FROM financial_recommendations WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, spending_pattern FROM financial_recommendations ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_recommendations WHERE user_id = 3 AND spending_pattern = 'conservative';
SELECT user_id FROM financial_recommendations WHERE spending_pattern = 'balanced' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, spending_pattern FROM financial_recommendations WHERE user_id IN (2, 4);
SELECT * FROM financial_recommendations WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, spending_pattern FROM financial_recommendations WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM financial_recommendations WHERE user_id = 3 AND spending_pattern = 'frugal';
SELECT user_id, spending_pattern FROM financial_recommendations WHERE spending_pattern LIKE '%save%';
SELECT user_id FROM financial_recommendations WHERE spending_pattern IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 'f5131f94-5a87-453e-9f95-60884f7a7e87';
SELECT user_id, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT users.username, transactions.amount, transactions.transaction_date FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT recommendation_text, date_created FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY date_created ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) as total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_transactions > 10;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, u.username FROM transactions t JOIN users u ON t.user_id = u.user_id;
SELECT r.recommendation_text, r.date_created, u.username FROM recommendations r JOIN users u ON r.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY r.date_created DESC;
SELECT user_id, total_spending FROM UserSpending;
SELECT * FROM TransactionHistory WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT user_id, total_spending FROM UserSpending ORDER BY total_spending DESC;
SELECT user_id, total_spending FROM UserSpending WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount, category FROM TransactionHistory WHERE category = 'Groceries';
SELECT * FROM UserSpending WHERE total_spending > 1000 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, total_spending FROM UserSpending WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT category_name, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM TransactionHistory GROUP BY category_name HAVING total_amount > 500 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT u.user_id, u.total_spending, r.recommendation_text FROM UserSpending u JOIN UserRecommendations r ON u.user_id = r.user_id;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, c.category_name FROM TransactionHistory t JOIN SpendingCategories c ON t.category = c.category_name ORDER BY t.transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT full_name, email FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, location FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT user_id, high_spending_category, low_spending_category FROM spending_patterns WHERE average_spending > 500;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age < 30 ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, full_name, email FROM users WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT user_id, full_name, email, amount FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, high_spending_category, low_spending_category, average_spending FROM spending_patterns WHERE average_spending > 500 ORDER BY average_spending DESC;
SELECT user_id, best_recommendation, other_recommendations FROM recommendations WHERE ARRAY_LENGTH(other_recommendations) > 0 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
